title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2022 Comments on Pay for Nurses
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Independent MP for North Islington, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Nurses’ pay must rise with inflation. That is the bare minimum.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

Applause on our doorsteps rings hollow without solidarity on the picket line.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

If nurses go on strike, they will have my full support.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
